Package com.davidbracewell.hermes

Hermes is a framework for Natural Language Processing.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnnotatableType
    An annotatable type is one that can be added to a document through the use of a Pipeline.
    AnnotatedObject
    An object containing linguistic Annotations.
    AnnotationSet
    An AnnotationSet acts as the storage mechanism for annotations associated with a document.
    AttributedObject
    An AttributedObject is an object that has zero or more attributes associated with it.
    Hermes
    Convenience methods for getting common configuration options.
    RelationalObject
    The interface Relational object.
    Types
    Common Annotation Types

    Annotation
    Associates a type, e.g.
    AnnotationTree
    The type Annotation tree.
    AnnotationType
    An AnnotationType serves to define the structure and source of a specific annotation.
    AnnotatorCache
    Factory with cache for constructing/retrieving annotators for a given annotation class.
    AttributeType
    An Attribute represents a name and value type.
    CaduceusExample  
    CorpusExample  
    CustomAnnotator  
    DefaultAnnotationSet
    A default implementation of an AnnotationSet that uses two sorted sets.
    DependencyParseExample  
    Document
    The document is the central object class in the TIPSTER architecture.
    DocumentFactory
    A document factory facilitates the creation of document objects.
    DocumentFactory.Builder
    Builder for DocumentFactory
    Fragments
    Convenience methods for constructing orphaned and empty fragments.
    GettingStarted  
    HermesCommandLineApp
    The type Hermes command line app.
    HString
    Represents a java string on steroids.
    LexiconExample  
    MLExample  
    OpenNLPExample  
    Pipeline
    A pipeline wraps the process of annotating a document with one or more annotations.
    Pipeline.Builder
    A builder class for pipelines
    Relation

    Sandbox  
    Span
    Represents a starting (inclusive) and ending (exclusive) portion of a CharSequence.
    SparkExample  
    SparkSVOExample  
    TokenRegexExample  

Package com.davidbracewell.hermes Description

Hermes is a framework for Natural Language Processing. Its design is based on the Tipster architecture.
